using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading;
using AsyncGenerator.TestCases;
using NUnit.Framework;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.Sleep.Input
{
	using System.Threading.Tasks;
	public partial class TestCase
	{
		/// <summary>
		/// <see cref="Task.Delay(int,CancellationToken)"/>
		/// <see cref="Task.Delay(TimeSpan,CancellationToken)"/>
		/// </summary>
		/// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used to cancel the work</param>
		public async Task SleepAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(CancellationToken))
		{
			await (Task.Delay(10, cancellationToken));
			await (Task.Delay(TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(10), cancellationToken));

			var name = nameof(Task.Delay);
			Assert.That(name, Is.EqualTo(nameof(Task.Delay)));

			Runner.RunWithIntParameterAsync((arg) => Task.Delay(arg, cancellationToken));
			Runner.RunWithIntParameterAsync((arg) => Task.Delay(arg, cancellationToken));
		}

		public Task Sleep2Async(CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(CancellationToken))
		{
			return Task.Delay(10, cancellationToken);
		}
	}
}
